section: How and where is data stored?
body:
• The Ring is a 2160 (ie. 160bit) integer space
  • Divided into partitions of equal size
  • Virtual-nodes, or vnodes, claim a partition on the ring.
  • A cluster of vnodes live in a single Riak node (usually a physical node with a Riak instance running)
  • Each node has the same number of vnodes and hence the same number of partitions
